title: Ebert & Roeper - 04.27.08 - guest host Michael Phillips
description:
Ebert & Roeper  -  April 27th, 2008 - with guest host [url=http://www.chicagotribune.com/features/chi-michaelphillipscritic,1,931773.storygallery?coll=chi-entertainment-utl]Michael Phillips[/url], film critic for the Chicago Tribune

---- New movies this week:
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0371746/]Iron Man[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0800240/]Deception[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0871426/]Baby Mama[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0481536/]Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0446676/]Deal[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0960890/]Zombie Strippers[/url]

--- Next Week
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0866439/]Made of Honor[/url]
--- Coming Soon
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0811080/]Speed Racer[/url]

-------------------------------------------------
SPOILERS - The following list gives the thumbs up or thumbs down vote which the movies received.  (Phillips - Roeper)
-------------------------------------------------

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0371746/]Iron Man[/url]  -  (quick witted & really well acted) up - up
-- Robert Downey Jr. - Terrence Howard - Jeff Bridges - Gwyneth Paltrow

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0800240/]Deception[/url]  -  (way) down - (way) down
-- Ewan McGregor - Hugh Jackman - Michelle Williams - Natasha Henstridge - Charlotte Rampling - Maggie Q

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0871426/]Baby Mama[/url]  -  (mild) down - (mild) up
-- Tina Fey - Amy Poehler - Sigourney Weaver - Greg Kinnear - Steve Martin

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0481536/]Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay[/url]  -  down - down
-- John Cho - Kal Penn - Neil Patrick Harris

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0446676/]Deal[/url]  -  down - down
-- Burt Reynolds - Bret Harrison - Shannon Elizabeth

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0960890/]Zombie Strippers[/url]  -  down - down
-- Jenna Jameson - Jennifer Holland

	---Thumbs Up Video
		--Phillips:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0401383/]The Diving Bell and the Butterfly[/url]  -  2007  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Diving-Bell-Butterfly-Mathieu-Amalric/dp/B00104QSOC/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1209476000&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]
		--Roeper:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1060277/]Cloverfield[/url]  -  2008  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Cloverfield-Lizzy-Caplan/dp/B0014Z4OQG/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1209475941&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]

	---NEW ON VIDEO
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0385752/]The Golden Compass[/url]  -  up - up
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0988595/]27 Dresses[/url]  -  (near miss) down - (couldn&#039;t stand it) down

	---Roeper&#039;s Three to See (favorite movies currently in theaters)
		3 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0410377/]Nim&#039;s Island[/url]
		2 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0865556/]The Forbidden Kingdom[/url]
		1 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0800039/]Forgetting Sarah Marshall[/url]

-------------------------------------------------
Siskel & Ebert and Ebert & Roeper video reviews dating back to 1985 can be found at [url=http://www.atthemoviestv.com/]atthemoviestv.com[/url]
Free [url=http://www.apple.com/podcasting/]Podcasts[/url] of Ebert & Roeper are available at the [url=http://www.apple.com/itunes/]iTunes Music Store[/url]

[url=http://www.suntimes.com/index/roeper.html]Richard Roeper columns[/url]
